law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 15, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 2. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 3.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/24/2006). For the sake of consistency with the numbering system used throughout the Kentucky Revised Statutes, the designations "(a)," "(b)," "(c)," and "(d)" in this statute have been changed to "(1)," "(2)," "(3)," and "(4)." See KRS 7.136.
